name: MenuSubmenuTriggerItem
description: Item that triggers a submenu to open. Renders a `<div>` element with chevron icon.

props.name: label
props.description: Overrides the text label to use when the item is matched during keyboard text navigation.

props.name: nativeButton
props.description:
Whether the component renders a native `<button>` element when replacing it
via the `render` prop.
Set to `true` if the rendered element is a native button.

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the componentâ€™s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.
